front.title: The TPING option for the Telnet protocol

abstract.t: When using the telnet protocol to talk to a remote device, as one would with RFC 2217, it would be useful to be able to determine if the remote server is active or not. In contrast with the ''Are You There'' sub-option, the return message is not mixed into the data stream presented to the user or client program, it is simply passed between the telnet client/server pair.
